LONGDESCRIPTION: A different take on the little black dress. This black dress adds applique and sequined work in different colors to give it a different dimension. The pleated skirt and the waist band give it a sophisticated touch while retaining a timeless look.
MODATTRIBUTES: 'Knit construction', 'Blue color', 'S size', 'Cocktail & Evening occasion', 'Silk material', 'Mid Length length'
NAME: Gusso Silk Evening Dress
SHORTDESCRIPTION: Sleeveless evening dress with applique and sequined work
